c74object.name: mira.status
c74object.digest: Report status of all Mira clients.
c74object.description: Get a list of all clients connected to Mira. Note that 'added', 'changed' and 'removed' messages will be output automatically; you do not need to send a message to mira.status for output.

method.name: getconnections
method.digest: Get a list of all clients connected to Mira.
method.description: Output a list of all clients connected to Mira. Note that added, changed and removed messages will be output automatically; you do not need to send a message to mira.status for output. The output is in the form of [connection-id, connection-name], except in the case of 'removed' messages, which only output the ID.
